slide-1.title: How to Play
content: This game is similar to the typical Suwit game, using 2 dice (Black & Red). The Black Die shows Scissors, Rock, or Paper. The Red Die shows Thumb, Index, or Pinky.

slide-2.title: Placing Bets
content: You place bets to compete against the dealer by betting on single black/red die options, combinations of 2 dice, rows and columns, split bets, and corner bets.

slide-3.title: Bet Examples
content:
Rock > Scissors, Scissors > Paper, Paper > Rock
Index > Pinky, Pinky > Thumb, Thumb > Index
